Multivariate Regression in R

```{r}
# set working directory and 
# read data
multivariate <-read.csv("multivariate.csv")
head(multivariate)

```
```{r}
summary(multivariate)
```

```{r}
# generate linear regression of homeowners on immigrant
mm <-lm(Homeowners~Immigrant, data = multivariate)
#summary(mm)
summary(mm)$coef 

```

install.packages("Rtools")
install.packages("ggplot2")

library(ggplot2)
